name: Dylan Dog 14: Il Bosco degli Assassini
overview: Dylan Dog 14: Il Bosco degli Assassini is an Amiga arcade 2d adventure game released in Europe in 1993 by Simulmondo. They emerge from the darkness and descend on travelers like a horde of barbarians. They are the Banda del Bosco, a crew of merciless assassins, mutants with mysterious powers that kill for pleasure. The only survivor of their fury is the young Meggan Page and Dylan must protect her at all costs. But in the depths of the forest, anything can happen, and while the hunt rages, the prey can become a hunter ...
